channel.title: Pi pvp area
channel.description: hi im trying to make a pvp area in ardoughno like i want some places multi and some place 1v1 also i want the bank's safe areas. Can someone plz tell me what to do or is there a guide or something. Also i want it so that there are white and red skulls on top of there heads.

item.title: Pi pvp area
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

we are talking like serius coding here… all i can suggest is doenload
project-insanity
client and source
it already has built in pvp with 1v1 and multi…then change the server around abit

if you do decide to do this
on the client edit gui.java and client.java search for 127.0.0.1 or localhost and change to your ip

note:
its the source and server im using and at first its complicated to find your way around but after searching it becomes easy like
for client.java and commands ect its
scr->server->model->players
for client
for command go into pakcets

Read full topic
